name: Gravity Switch (itch) (Mister Luck Games)
description:
This is a short platformer game about flipping you gravity. Go through 10 levels, two of which are "Boss Levels". Avoid the spikes and get to the portal at the end. This is my first game ever, so I hope you like it. Made in Godot Engine.

Controller compatible, and can be easier with a controller.

Can be very annoying and may be a bit too hard.

Currently does not save progress.
